title: 두번째 숙박
text: 두번째 숙박이에요. 너무 좋아 한번 더 예약하고 갔는데~ 진짜 두번째 숙박도 좋았어요. 과하다 싶을정도로 친절하고 밥도 맛있고 온천도 너무 좋았어요

Best wishes

text: 딸아이와 함께 다녀왔습니다. 수영장에 튜브도 준비되어있고 아이와 함께 놀고 쉬고 먹고 오기 딱 좋습니다. 그리고 무엇보다 직원들이 엄청 친절합니다. 조식도 부페외에 메인메뉴가 나와 좋았습니다.

text:

text: 가족 온천여행으로 숙박했는데 머무르는 동안 편안하게 지냈습니다. 깨끗하고 노천탕도 좋고, 애프터눈티서비스 등 서비스도 아주 좋았습니다
response_body:

title: 良いホテルです！
text:
本サイトの口コミをベースに予約しました。
シャトルサービスの時間間隔が1時間置きなので、
移動は徒歩かTAXIになります。
坂があるので、お年寄りや荷物が多い人は注意。

ホテルはまだ新しいので、快適ですね。
サービスもこなれてないですが、一所懸命で好感が持てます。
あえて改善点を上げると、

・ホテルの外の仕上げとか、アチラコチラで雑な仕上げを感じます
・ライブラリが売りですが、古く、しかもダミーなものが多いので
意味が無いです。中古で良いので、きちんと用意したほうが良いです。
・連泊だと食事の変化が少なくて飽きる。
ハーフビッフェのメニューを変化させてほしい。

しかし、価格、場所、温泉、サービスなど、
総合的に言えば、おすすめします。

それとサービスの朝シャンパン（スパーリングワイン）があります！
これには驚きです。
response_body:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel.

We appreciate for you feedback and opinions. We will sharing with relevant departments.

Thank you very much and wish you have a nice day.

title: 素晴らしいスタッフ
text:
スタッフの対応は素晴らしいです。日本語の堪能なスタッフもいらっしゃいます。ホテル内レストランもおいしく、温泉設備も清潔で大満足。
周辺施設は乏しいですが、のんびりホテル滞在するにはちょうど良い。
response_body:
Dear Mr./Ms. Kotaro,

Thank you for stay at The Gaia Hotel.

It was great to hearing you feedback and we will sharing your positive comment with all staff.

Looking forward to seeing you in the next trip.

text: 직원들이 친절하고 체크인 할때 한국어 가능한 직원이 있어서 좋았어요 노천탕 아담하긴한데 좋았고 방에 미니바 무료가 매력적~ 할머니랑 갔는데 무릎이 좀 안좋으셔서 노천탕 내려가는 계단은 좀 힘들어하셨지만 그런경우가 아니라면 신경안써도 될듯 아침 조식도 깔끔하고 나름 다양해서 어르신들 배부르게 드셨어요 룸 컨디션도 좋고... 다음에 또 갈 의향 잇을정도~
response_body:
Dear guest,
Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. We will sharing your feedback with the staff and thank you for the positive commens. We will sharing your encorage with all staff and looking forward to seeing you in the nest trip.

title: 굿
text:
일본 료칸의 서비스를 받는듯 했다. 
룸은 매우 청결하고 수영장, 실내외 온천 모두 무료이용이라 편했고, 룸에서 온천물이 나오니 더 좋았다.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. Your kindly feedback is a great encourage for us. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

title: 더 가이아 호텔 너무 좋았어요
text: 엄마가 온천을 좋아하셔서 더 가이아호텔에 묵었는데, 베이터우역에서 픽업서비스도 너무 친절하고 좋았고, 호텔도 너무 깔끔했어요. 직원들 모두 너무나도 친절하셨고, 방도 깨끗하고, 방에서도 온천을 할수 있다는게 아주 좋았습니다! 조식도 깔끔하고, 저녁에 2층 식당에서 먹은 사천요리도 아주 훌륭했어요^^ 1박이라 아쉬워서, 다음에 오게 된다면 2박 이상 묵고싶네요
response_body:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for choosing The Gaia Hotel.
It was really nice to have your feedback. Your encourage make our staff progress. 

Thank you very much and looking forward to seeing you during the next trip in Taiwan.

title: 너무좋아요.
text:
굉장히 만족합니다.
일단 체크인은 정확히 3시에 가능했지만, 캐리어보관해주셔서 맡기고 관광이가능했구요. 
직원분들도 다친절하시고, 온천도 사람이없어 엄마랑 둘이 저녁에도하고 다음날아침에도 하고 계속했네요^^
유황냄새는 조금나긴했지만, 물도깨끗하고  노천욕하기  너무좋았어요.
response_body: I apologize to reply you in English. Thank you for your encourage. We are very appreciated for your commend. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel again.

title: Déconnection aux sources chaudes de Beitou
text: Hotel spa qui est un excellent choix pour la relaxation et les sources chaudes. Services épatants, tous les employés veulent vous aider mais sont fortement limités par leur capacité de parler anglais. En faisant preuve de patiente face à cette communication, vous pourrez avoir un séjour extraordinaire!
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. All staffs are very appreciated. Hope you have a wonderful travel and visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

title: 온천하기 좋은 숙소
text:
친절하고 깨끗합니다. 
신베이터우역과 더 가깝고 온천과 휴식을 즐기기에 좋은 숙소입니다.
조식은 개선이 필요해보입니다.
response_body: I apologize to reply you in English. Thank you for your encourage. We are very appreciated for your commend. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel again.

text:
호텔 직원분들이 모두 엄청 친절하셔서 기분 좋고 편안하게 지냈어요
온천을 객실에서 즐길 수 있는 점이 정말 좋았는데요
키가 크신 분들에게는 좀 작을 거에요
퍼블릭 온천은 생각보다 별로였어요
유황 온천이라고 하던데,
씻고 나면 머리카락이랑 피부가 부들부들 해져서 
온천 호텔로 강추입니다
호텔에서 쉬고만 있어도 좋고
근처에 공원도 있어서 여유가 된다면
동네 구경하는 재미도 솔솔 할 것 같아요
호텔에서 다양한 노선으로 셔틀 운행하니 그걸 이용해서 다니면 좋을 거에요 
저는 일정상 그걸 못해서 아쉬웠어요
또 가고 싶은 곳이에요

가성비는 그닥 좋지 않았지만 그런대로 가족들과 편하게 지낼 수 있는 곳입니다 
신베이터우도 가깝구요.
response_body: I apologize to reply you in English. Thank you for your support. All staffs are very appreciated. We apologize for your inconvenience during your stay. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel again.

text: 친절하고, 시설 다양하고, 깨끗하고 좋아요
response_body: I apologize to reply you in English. Thank you for your support. All staffs are very appreciated. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel again.

title: とても良いホテルですよ
text:
部屋は清潔，広さも充分，冷蔵庫内もお菓子も無料
映画も無料で見放題
部屋の風呂のお湯も最高，大風呂もいい。
ただ，部屋が寒い
どれだけ温度を上げても冷たい風しかこない・・・
非常に残念
朝食はブッフェとアラカルトのセットですが
このアラカルトがことごとく外れ
正直がっかり。。
まあ，ブッフェだけでも充分ですけどね。
response_body: このたび、ご来店ご意見をいただき誠にありがとうございます。今回頂きました、ありがたいご指摘のお言葉を、今後のスタッフ皆にとっての、大切な励みとさせて頂きます。そしてそれを胸に、スタッフ皆で今後とも、より一層のお客様ご満足のために、日々の精進にまた、邁進させて頂きます。お客様、是非当館へと、再度、御足をお運びくださいませ。スタッフ皆、改善尽力を重ねながら、一日千秋の思いにて、お待ち申し上げております。このたびのお越し、及び、賜りましたありがたいお言葉に、末尾ではございますが、再度衷心より、お礼を申し上げます。

title: きれいなホテルです
text: 新しくきれいなホテルでした。特に温泉がよく温度の違う露天風呂が2つ、スパもあり日本の温泉宿と遜色ありませんでした。ただしレストランがイマイチ。朝夕2食付プランでしたが夕食は和食のしゃぶしゃぶを選んだ方が良かったかもしれません。洋食は肉と魚からメインを選びあとは前菜がバイキング形式。しかも朝食にも同じものが出ていてがっかりでした。寒くてゆっくり食事する雰囲気でなかったのも残念でした。温泉宿で食事をしてもいいのですが急な階段を何段も降りなけれななりませんのでキツイかもしれません。日本語はカタコトで話せるスタッフがいますが細かい注文はできず、アロママッサージを同じ時間で2名で予約していたのですが1名枠しかなく予約をキャンセルしました。部屋に忘れ物をしたのですがメール連絡がありこういった対応はしっかりしていてホスピタリティを感じました。
response_body: このたび、ご来店ご意見をいただき誠にありがとうございます。今回頂きました、ありがたいご指摘のお言葉を、今後のスタッフ皆にとっての、大切な励みとさせて頂きます。そしてそれを胸に、スタッフ皆で今後とも、より一層のお客様ご満足のために、日々の精進にまた、邁進させて頂きます。お客様、是非当館へと、再度、御足をお運びくださいませ。スタッフ皆、改善尽力を重ねながら、一日千秋の思いにて、お待ち申し上げております。このたびのお越し、及び、賜りましたありがたいお言葉に、末尾ではございますが、再度衷心より、お礼を申し上げます。

title: Relaxing trip
text: It is relaxing to stay at the Gaia Hotel.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel! We are highly appreciate for your encourage and very glad that you enjoy your journey here. Awaiting for your visiting the Gaia Hotel next time.

title: 一級棒
text: 服務一流
response_body: 感謝您對大地酒店同仁們的鼓勵！您的支持是給予我們持續前進的動力，也期待您的再次入住。

text: The reception staff members are very friendly and willing to help.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. All staffs are very appreciated. Hope you have a wonderful travel and visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

title: Nice Hotel with 5 star service
text: Amazing staying experience, heart felt service from arrival utill my departure specially unexpected rooming. All staff from porter , front desk,restaurant staff gave us a big and warm smile with greeting .Great hotel service, clean, friendly staff all willing to help. Morden design, good location, quiet, nice view. Unfortunately didn't use public hot spring facilities but in room did. Memorable stay!
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel! We are highly appreciate for your encourage and very glad that you enjoy your journey here. Awaiting for your visiting the Gaia Hotel next time.

text: 地方很好，會再入住
response_body: 感謝您給予大地酒店的分享，您的鼓勵是給予全體員工最大的支持，衷心期盼您的再度蒞臨。

text: Excellent service with comfortable and neat environment provided. The cuisine is unexpectedly good.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. All staffs are very appreciated for your encourage. Hope you have a wonderful travel and visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

title: 整體十分舒適
text: 整體十分舒適，溫泉很好，如果有coffee bar更佳。但差不多16：00先可以捷提供房間
response_body: 感謝您給予大地酒店的分享，您的鼓勵是給予全體員工最大的支持，衷心期盼您的再度蒞臨。

title: 超愉快住宿經驗
text: 由踏入洒店開始已感受員工真誠親切禮待，勝過以往縱遊各國的5星級名酒店。房間日式設計，很整齊，有獨立溫泉，超正。酒店另有戶外溫泉，設備很好。值得再去。
response_body: 感謝您給予大地酒店同仁的鼓勵與肯定！非常感謝您給予本飯店的建議並分享您此次入住的感想，期待您的再次蒞臨。

title: 很貼心的酒店
text: 服務細心到位。銀婚紀念日多謝洒店上下悉心安排。
response_body: 感謝您對大地酒店的鼓勵！非常謝謝您與酒店員工分享您的銀婚紀念品，期待您未來的無數個紀念品也與酒店同仁共享您的喜悅！期待您的再次蒞臨。

title: 舒適的兩日一夜
text:
好:環境好而舒適,房內會有小食甜品果汁免費提供,晚餐因食涮涮鍋check in 時有抽籤活動,所以有折扣優惠

text: 服務人員十分好，對嬰兒照顧十分週到,唯獨房間照明比較暗，房間裏面飲的、吃的都是免費。

title: 物有所值
text: 由登上接駁車至離開酒店，期間所遇到的飯店員工皆親切有禮，非常主動協助 / 提供資訊。有幸遇到王先生特地開放酒窖及品酒室參觀，非常感謝。無論是大眾的室外溫泉，還是房內的私人溫泉都很舒適乾淨。十分推薦！
response_body: 感謝您給予大地酒店所有同仁的鼓勵與肯定！大地酒店希冀帶給每位貴賓專屬大地的片刻寧靜與舒適氛圍，讓身心靈獲得休憩與放鬆。感謝您的分享，也期待您的再次蒞臨。

text: 無需多講,你決定選擇此酒店後,便可安心入住,不會選擇錯.
response_body: 感謝您對大地酒店的鼓勵與肯定！大地酒店希望帶給每位貴賓滿足與愉悅的住宿體驗，也非常謝謝您與我們分享，期待您的再度蒞臨。

title: Very good services

title: Gem of a find
text: The hotel staff were extremely gracious and helpful.  The hot rock massage was an amazing and wonderful experience.  The public hot springs at the hotel offered indoor and outdoor hot mineral pools.  The food at the Chinese restaurant was excellent.  Breakfast buffet offered a variety of Chinese foods and tasty smoked salmon.  There are few Americans that stay at this hotel, however, I recommend the hotel to all my fellow countrymen.
response_body:
Dear JILL,
Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. We will sharing your feedback with the staff and thank you for the positive commens. We will sharing your encorage with all staff and looking forward to seeing you in the nest trip.

title: Pleasant Stay at The Gaia
text: We had a great stay at The Gaia. Staff were extremely friendly, the hotel was nice and we loved the extra touches they provided (evening turn down service, complimentary drinks and snacks in the room and both indoor and outdoor slippers for when you visit the public springs downstairs, etc). The location was also good - on a hill where it’s quiet, overlooking the city but also a quick walk to the metro (there’s a shortcut that’s not shown on maps that makes it really easy). Food at the hotel was also good- we did dinner and breakfast there, both offered plenty of delicious options. We will definitely be coming back.
response_body:
Dear guest,
Thank you for your kindly feedback. Your feedback is very important to us. We looking forward to seeing you in the next trip.

text: Service was amazing but housekeeping has issues. Maid service never came back after we said we were leaving.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. We will retraining our housekeeping and thank you for your kindly understanding.  Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

text: This hotel is phenomenal. Exceeded expectations. Huge room, comfortable bed. Huge bathroom.  The in room onsen is absolutely incredible. The service goes above and beyond. Not a single bad/negetive thing about our stay. Cannot recommend highly enough. Simply outstanding. Perfect place to relax. Thank you thank you thank you Gaia!
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel. Your kindly feedback is a great encourage for us. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel next time.

title: Amazing stay! Will return again.
text: An oasis of comfort and retreat where we enjoyed great facilities. Excellent service staff at the front door and throughout the hotel. They were welcoming, attentive and helpful. We were upgraded on arrival. And, though we checked out at the usual timing, we were allowed to use the hot spring to freshen up before the night flight. Location of the hotel might be a way off but they provide a shuttle service to the nearby MRT station that connected us to explore Taipei.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel! All staffs are very appreciate for your greatest encourage and admired. We are very glad you enjoy your trip during your stay.  Looking forward for your visit next time.

title: Fantastic relaxing stay
text: Great hotel. The hot springs (exclusive for hotel guests) were amazing with in/outdoor pools and sauna,cold plunge and steam room. Also the hydrotherapy and outdoor pool was relaxing and has a nice view of Beitou. Staff is super helpful and friendly - Wen at front desk, Marco the manager and the doormen went out of their way to help us around and answer questions. Helped book train tickets and had a free shuttle to the train station. Room had good amenities including a hot springs soaker tub and the complementary snacks, dessert  and beer/ juices are a nice touch. Breakfast was very good with western and Taiwanese choices. Great hotel in a nice area of Taipei.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel! We are highly appreciate for your encourage and very glad that you enjoy your journey here. Awaiting for your visiting the Gaia Hotel next time.

title: High quality worth the price. Beautiful hot spring
text: I was looking for a hot springs hotel which had its own spa area.  This hotel did NOT disappoint.  I was there during the week and so it was very quiet. I was often the only one in the spa area.  Beautiful outside spa, just past the indoor spa.  (I didn't appreciate the falling snow/soap bubbles because the fan blower made so much noise).  Restaurant prices were expensive, but I did enjoy the vegetarian set course.  Complimentary:evening drink, afternoon snack, non-alcoholic drinks in minibar, snacks, coffee maker, movies, WiFi.  Nice to have hot springs bath in the room, too. I would definitely return. I'm happy I planned 2 nights, 1 is not enough. Nice architecture and design. Highly recommended.
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel and your encourage and admired to all our staffs. We are very glad that you enjoy your trip during your stay. I am apologize for the noise of falling snow sound.  Looking forward for your visit next time.

title: Great Hotel in Beitou!
text: This is a great hotel-- very clean, well decorated with an excellent hot springs bath area. There are three restaurants on the premises; the Chinese restaurant strangely didn't have lots of options for a single diner (or maybe I misunderstood). Close to Beitou park and all attractions, with a free shuttle to take you to either Beitou or Xinbeitou stations. Breakfast was included, and was excellent. My only complaint is that the beds were way too firm for my liking, but otherwise, great stay!
response_body: Thank you for your staying with The Gaia Hotel and for your feedback on your recent stay with us. Your greatest encourage is the biggest support for us. Your satisfaction is the most important thing to us. Look forward to see you next time.

title: Nice experience
text: Hot spring tub in the room was amazing, as they are on the thrid floor (public indoor and outdoor pool). My only disappointment was the breakfast, taste was bad especially the beef (I forgot the name).
response_body: Thank you for staying at The Gaia Hotel! We are sorry that the breakfast makes you fell disappointed. We will work hard to improve the breakfast quality. Hope you will visit The Gaia Hotel to see our improve.

text: very friendly staffs.
response_body: 感謝您給予大地酒店的分享，您的鼓勵是給予全體員工最大的支持，衷心期盼您的再度蒞臨。

title: 第二次入住大地，今次實在有點失望。
text:
今年已經是第二次入住大地酒店，可惜第二次總比第一次欠缺驚喜，實在有點失望。主要是房間安排不到位，酒店竟然提供了兩間沒有電梯可到達的樓層給我們。酒店電梯只能到達7樓，我們入住的房間在8樓，需要行上一層樓。但是太太剛剛完成了膝部手術，行動上實在有點問題，要一步一步慢慢行才能上到房間，當然下來乘電梯都要同樣困難。
還有，8樓的房間空間有點細小，比較今年6月入住的房間細了少許。並且浴室內的溫泉區也不及上次的好，上次可於房間內透過一塊大玻璃能看到浴室內的溫泉區。今次就只有牆，沒有大玻璃！
我們訂了兩間客房，都安排在8樓，實在有點失望。
response_body:
Dear Che Tak，
感謝您再次入住大地酒店。
很抱歉此次安排的房型未能讓您滿意，已註明將您的喜好，下次入住時將會依照您的需求安排。
入住期間如有任何問題，也歡迎您隨時與我們溝通，我們很樂於為您提供最好的入住體驗。
感謝您的支持，期盼您的再次入住。
謝謝。
大地酒店管理團隊

text:
服務員貼心,無論接送專車司機,前枱美女服務員,各餐廳服務員,都非常禮貌熱心,多謝各位款待.
P.S.唯溫泉池有頭髮結,要加強清潔
response_body:
Dear Lai Fong,
謝謝您分享您的住宿體驗。 很高興得知您有愉快的入住體驗，並且喜歡我們提供的服務與設施。 我們秉持熱誠服務的心，期望每位貴賓都能留下美好的回憶。同時，感謝您的意見，我們將會請同仁再多加注意各方面的清潔。

再次感謝您的分享與肯定，衷心期待您的再次光臨。
大地酒店管理團隊

title: 我為太太包場慶祝生日
text:
5月尾入住大地酒店兩晚，當天是平日的星期三，酒店客人比較少，但是酒店房間價錢也並不便宜，假如是在冬天旺季溫泉酒店的房價會否更高呢？酒店在北投奇岩路山區位置有點遠，附近也較難找吃。有一個比較奇怪的經歷，第一天早上在西餐廳食早餐時，只有我們夫婦兩位客人；晚上在奇岩一號進餐時也只有我們夫婦兩位食客；第二晚在月兒彎彎涮涮鍋也是只有我們一台食客；晚上9晚在the Gaia 芳療spa做了個90分鐘的減壓spa全店也是只有我一位客人；第三天的早上活水區玩了30分鐘，也是只有我們兩位泳客。這三天有個奇怪的經歷，就好像我們夫婦二人在大地酒店作了包場活動，我笑說為太太豪花了金錢包下了整座酒店為她慶祝生日！哈哈哈真有趣！
總的來說我們對酒店服務是十分滿意的，需然房間有點細少，但是房間內的配置也算精致高品位，值得一讚！
response_body:
Dear Mr. Che,
感謝您的評論，很高興您喜歡我們提供的服務，期待您的再次入住，謝謝。

text: Very well-trained staff, great hospitality. Private onsen in room is spacious, and the outdoor one is adequate. A little off the MRT station but there is an hourly shuttle bus for those who need. Will definitely consider coming back.

title: 極差之飯店
text: 飯店沒有key到從hotels的訂單，在櫃檯查詢了很久一直不能確定我已經收到訂房成功的確認信，check-in搞了半個多小時，還是髒房到了現場才清理，還問同事說我們有跟hotels合作嗎，離譜到不行。進房間後抽屜還有上組客人遺留的襪子 真的很噁心。然後我不知道為什麼從趴車到服務員一直問客人名字，check-in的不是他們被問了兩三次不知道在問全名問什麼的。整體服務糟到不行
response_body:
